results.name: a(n) = n^phi(n).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..100
Brett A. Harrison, On the reducibility of cyclotomic polynomials over finite fields, Am. Math. Monthly, Vol. 114, No. 9 (2007), pp. 813-818.
formula: a(n) = A001783(n) / (Product_{d|n} (d!/d^d)^A008683(n/d)) = (Product_{GCD(k, n)=1} k) / (Product_{d|n} (d!/d^d)^A008683(n/d)) = A175504(n) * n. - _Jaroslav Krizek_, May 31 2010
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 24 2001
